src_original: <27> atha khalu sarvaśuro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavato'ntikāttadutsāhaṃ śrutvā bhagavantametadavocat - kiyantaṃ bhagavaṃsteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ āyuṣpramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati |
tgt_original: 爾時一切勇菩薩白佛言。 世尊。 若有眾生聞此法者壽命幾劫。

src_original: <28> sarvaśūro bodhisattva āha - kiyantaṃ bhagavan kalpasya pramāṇaṃ |
tgt_original: 一切勇白佛言。 劫以何量。

src_original: tadyathāpi nāma sarvaśūra kaścideva puruṣo nagaraṃ kārayeddvādaśayojanāyāmavistāraṃ ūrdhvena trīṇi yojanāni pramāṇaṃ |
tgt_original: 譬如大城縱廣十二由旬高三由旬盛滿胡麻。

src_original: tacca nagaraṃ tilaphalakaiḥ paripūrṇaṃ kuryāt (sa ca puruṣa śirajīvī syāt)  atha sa puruṣo varṣaśatasyātyayāttatastilaphalakaiḥ paripūrṇānnagarād ekaṃ tilaphalakaṃ bahirnikṣipedanena paryāyeṇa sa puruṣaḥ sarvāṇi tāni tilaphalakāni kṣayaṃ kuryāt paryavadānaṃ kuryāt tacca nagaramamūlamapratiṣṭhānāṃ bhavenna cādyāpi ca kalpaṃ kṣīyeta ||  <29> punaraparaṃ sarvaśūra (aparāṃ te upamā kariṣyāmyasyaivārthasya prasiddhaye |  ) tadyathāpi nāma parvato bhavet paṃcaviṃśad yojanāni pramāṇena dvādaśa yojanānyūrdhvena |  atha kaścideva puruṣastasya parvatasya pārśve gṛhaṃ kārayet sa dīrghasyādhvano varṣaśatasyātyayena kāśikena vastreṇaikavārā parimārjayedevaṃ kṛtvā tasya parvatasya kṣayo bhavenna ca kalpaṃ kṣīyeta |
tgt_original: 有長壽人過百歲已取一而去。
